name: RMS Rhythm Game Thai Song
description:
**Feel free to stream or playing in public.

Allowed song license by RMS Publishing co.,ltd

If you want to use music for commercial purposes or make new recordings other than just playing games contact us at https://rmspublishing.biz/

Developed using Unity3d.

How to play => Press button by rhythm close to 3 game panel.

Game panel have three button position (First, Second, Third) control by

1. Use Arrow Keys "Left", "Top", "Down", "Right"

2. Use "J", "K", "L" Button

3. Use "A", "S", "D" Button

Change Camera view by using "C" or "NumPad9" button.

Change Note Speed by using "N" and "+", "-" or "NumPad4", "NumPad5" button

Change Song Speed by using "+", "-" or "NumPad1", "NumPad2" button.

Change Volume by using "Shift" and "+", "-" button.

Change Resolution by using "Control" and "+", "-" or "NumPad7", "NumPad8" button.

"Alt" + "Enter" to Toggle Full Screen

Change Text Karaoke Reading Language by using "T" Button (No Translate TH <> EN)
